document.title: Western Catholic Educational Association: Catholic Identity Standards

BAC58C7C0CA143DD8008FA4C63A8EAAC.description: All school personnel are actively engaged in bringing the Good News of Jesus into the total educational experience. ( Interviews, Observation)

7A11E691E0024EEEBFF041B45C62500B.description: The use of signs, sacramentals, traditions, and rituals of the Roman Catholic Church.   (Observation)

1E93E67AE2E74138BB44468C46194CAC.description: A service-oriented outreach to Church and the civic community after the example of Jesus Christ who said, “I have given you an example so that you may copy what I have done to you.”(John 13:15) (Programs, Observation)

AC19FC1BC43B4045B68A8378789EF01E.description: Maintenance of an active partnership with parents whose fundamental concern is the spiritual and academic education of their children. (Interviews, Observation, Constitutions/By-Laws, Canon 796

AF185F1BB5B04CF0ABC6BC28D267C2F5.description: The local Ordinary approves those who teach the Catholic Faith (Canon 805,) and their formation for catechetical and instructional competence is ongoing.    (Records, Interviews)

96E95BEB7ED3440AB5B1BE95A272990C.description: A Religion curriculum and instruction that is faithful to Roman Catholic Church teachings and meets the requirements set forth by the USCCB.   (Documents, Observation, Interviews)

BC7CF4AC511442109507AA769BF6AE27.description: Provision of regular opportunities for the school community to experience prayer and the Sacraments.      (Observation, Interviews)

509BE8999E8748AE8A829D5B126EE6DE.description: A Mission Statement and a Philosophy Statement which indicate the integration of the Roman Catholic Faith into all aspects of school life.   (Documents)

39CC6AA7C712485B915FE7B2B16011FB.description: The Catholic Identity of the School: The school is Catholic, approved by the Local Ordinary (Canon 803), providing authentic Catholic teaching, opportunities for community worship and participation in the Sacraments, and promoting evangelization and service to the community.
